ComicInfo.Summary: Life in the prison is getting a little tense while three of them are still missing. Nevertheless, Andrea and Tyreese seem to be ready for the storm that is coming and that's because the Governor is now sure that the prison is near.
ComicInfo.Title: The Best Defense, Pt. 6
